==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ぎ|くん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
{{compound|義|訓|tr1=gi|tr2=kun|t1=[[meaning]]|t2=[[instruct]]|lang=ja|sort=きくん'}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぎくん}}

# false reading (a [[kanji]] [[compound]] whose [[reading]] does not match the readings of its component characters).
# reading of a kanji by meaning; a kanji compound whose characters are used for meaning, not sound, such as {{m|ja|今日||today|tr=きょう, kyō}}.
